mapper.sql:
ato_pk, a.project_fk AS a_project_fk, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', a.ato_date) AS a_ato_date, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', a.opened_date) AS a_opened_date, a.comments AS a_comments, a.last_updated_by AS a_last_updated_by, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', a.last_updated_date) AS a_last_updated_date,
COUNT(DISTINCT issue_c.issue_pk) AS a_total_issues, SUM(CASE WHEN issue_c.status = '6 - Closed (Successful)' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS a_total_issues_closed
GROUP BY a.ato_pk, a.project_fk, a.ato_date, a.last_updated_by, a.last_updated_date

SELECT
FROM ato a LEFT OUTER JOIN issue issue_c ON a.ato_pk = issue_c.ato_fk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ato ( project_fk, ato_date, opened_date, comments, last_updated_by, last_updated_date ) VALUES ( #{projectFk}, #{atoDateSql}, #{openedDateSql}, #{comments}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, datetime('now', 'localtime') )
mapper.update: UPDATE ato SET project_fk = #{projectFk}, ato_date = #{atoDateSql}, opened_date = #{openedDateSql}, comments = #{comments}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy}, last_updated_date = datetime('now', 'localtime') WHERE ato_pk = #{id}
